# Gåri

> Gåri (gaari.no) is a free, bilingual (Norwegian/English) event aggregator for Bergen, Norway. It collects events from 44 independent sources — concert venues, theatres, museums, libraries, festivals, ticket platforms and more — and presents them in one searchable, filterable calendar. Updated twice daily by automated scrapers. No registration required.

The name comes from the Bergen dialect phrase "Ke' det går i?" meaning "What's going on?".

## What Gåri covers

- **Location:** Bergen municipality, Norway (all bydeler: Sentrum, Bergenhus, Fana, Ytrebygda, Laksevåg, Fyllingsdalen, Åsane, Arna)
- **Languages:** Norwegian (bokmål) and English
- **Event categories:** music, culture, theatre, family, food, festival, sports, nightlife, workshop, student, tours
- **Price range:** free and paid events
- **Update frequency:** twice daily (06:00 and 18:00 CET)

## Key pages

- [Homepage — all Bergen events](https://gaari.no/no/) (Norwegian)
- [Homepage — all Bergen events](https://gaari.no/en/) (English)
- [Hva skjer i Bergen i kveld](https://gaari.no/no/i-kveld) — tonight's events in Bergen
- [Denne helgen i Bergen](https://gaari.no/no/denne-helgen) — this weekend's events in Bergen
- [Gratis i Bergen denne uken](https://gaari.no/no/gratis) — free events in Bergen this week
- [Konserter i Bergen](https://gaari.no/no/konserter) — concerts and live music in Bergen this week
- [Familiehelg i Bergen](https://gaari.no/no/familiehelg) — family events in Bergen this weekend
- [Studentkveld i Bergen](https://gaari.no/no/studentkveld) — student nightlife in Bergen
- [Today in Bergen](https://gaari.no/en/today-in-bergen) — today's events in Bergen (English)
- [This Weekend in Bergen](https://gaari.no/en/this-weekend) — this weekend's events in Bergen (English)
- [About Gåri](https://gaari.no/en/about) — about the project
- [Data collection and legal basis](https://gaari.no/no/datainnsamling) — sources, GDPR, opt-out

## Data sources (44 active)

### Performance venues
Grieghallen, Den Nationale Scene (DNS), Ole Bull Huset, USF Verftet, Forum Scene, Bergen Filharmoniske Orkester (Harmonien), Carte Blanche, BIT Teatergarasjen, Det Vestnorske Teateret, Cornerteateret, Bergen Kjøtt, Oseana, Kulturhuset i Bergen, Bergen Kunsthall

### Arts, culture and literature
KODE (Bergen art museums), Litteraturhuset Bergen, Media City Bergen, BEK (Bergen Centre for Electronic Arts), Bergen Filmklubb, Bergen Kunsthall

### Libraries and museums
Bergen Bibliotek, Bymuseet i Bergen, Museum Vest (Fiskerimuseum, Sjøfartsmuseum, Hanseatiske Museum), Akvariet i Bergen, Fløyen

### Ticket platforms
Eventbrite, TicketCo (multiple Bergen venues), Hoopla

### General aggregators
Bergen Kommune (official events calendar), VisitBergen, StudentBergen, Bergen Live

### Food and nightlife
Colonialen, Råbrent, Paint'n Sip, Brettspill-cafe, Bjørgvin Blues Club, Nordnes Sjøbad

### Sports and outdoor
SK Brann (football), DNT Bergen (hiking tours)

### Festivals
Festspillene i Bergen, Bergenfest, Beyond the Gates, VVV (climate festival)

### Other
Bergen Chamber of Commerce events, Kvarteret (student venue)

## Contact

gaari.bergen@proton.me

## Technical

- Built with SvelteKit, Supabase, hosted on Vercel
- Events have bilingual AI-generated descriptions (Norwegian + English, <160 chars each)
- All descriptions are original AI-generated content, not copied from source pages
- Sitemap: https://gaari.no/sitemap.xml
